description: Detects reg command lines that disable certain important features of Microsoft Defender
name: Registry Defender Tampering
query: (process.executable.text:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR *SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\*) AND process.command_line.text:*\ add\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/d\ 0* AND process.command_line.text:(*Real\-Time\ Protection* OR *TamperProtection*))
author: Florian Roth
